mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, waybill_goods_packing_list_code AS waybillGoodsPackingListCode, waybill_code AS waybillCode, goods_name AS goodsName, unit_price AS unitPrice, unit_price_unit_code AS unitPriceUnitCode, number_qty AS numberQty, number_qty_unit_code AS numberQtyUnitCode, ttl_weight AS ttlWeight, ttl_weight_unit_code AS ttlWeightUnitCode, total_weight AS totalWeight, total_weight_unit_code AS totalWeightUnitCode, total_volume AS totalVolume, total_volume_unit_code AS totalVolumeUnitCode, description AS description, remark AS remark, disabled AS disabled, deleted AS deleted, module_code AS moduleCode, creator_user_code AS creatorUserCode, creator_username AS creatorUsername, create_time AS createTime, update_user_code AS updateUserCode, update_username AS updateUsername, update_time AS updateTime, ip AS ip, operator_longitude AS operatorLongitude, operator_latitude AS operatorLatitude, owner_user_code AS ownerUserCode, owner_org_code AS ownerOrgCode, owner_org_name AS ownerOrgName, synchronous_id AS synchronousId FROM waybill_downstream_goods_packing_list WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waybill_downstream_goods_packing_list ( waybill_goods_packing_list_code, waybill_code, goods_name, unit_price, unit_price_unit_code, number_qty, number_qty_unit_code, ttl_weight, ttl_weight_unit_code, total_weight, total_weight_unit_code, total_volume, total_volume_unit_code, description, remark, disabled, deleted, module_code, creator_user_code, creator_username, create_time, update_user_code, update_username, update_time, ip, operator_longitude, operator_latitude, owner_user_code, owner_org_code, owner_org_name, synchronous_id ) VALUES ( #{waybillGoodsPackingListCode}, #{waybillCode}, #{goodsName}, #{unitPrice}, #{unitPriceUnitCode}, #{numberQty}, #{numberQtyUnitCode}, #{ttlWeight}, #{ttlWeightUnitCode}, #{totalWeight}, #{totalWeightUnitCode}, #{totalVolume}, #{totalVolumeUnitCode}, #{description}, #{remark}, #{disabled}, #{deleted}, #{moduleCode}, #{creatorUserCode}, #{creatorUsername}, #{createTime}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateUsername}, #{updateTime}, #{ip}, #{operatorLongitude}, #{operatorLatitude}, #{ownerUserCode}, #{ownerOrgCode}, #{ownerOrgName}, #{synchronousId} )
mapper.update:
